lorebooks.name: Cyberware Lorebook
lorebooks.website_description: All the Cyberware from Cyberpunk RED and Interface Magazines
lorebooks.description: A complete listing of Cyberpunk RED cyberware formatted for SillyTavern.
lorebooks.creator: upbeat_hat_57300

1.name: Biomonitor
1.content:
Subdermal implant which generates a constant LED readout of pulse, temperature, respiration, blood sugar, etc. You can link your Biomonitor to your Agent to allow it to track your wellness.

**Install**: Mall
**Cost**: 100eb (Premium)
**HL**: 0 (N/A)
**Category**: Fashionware
**Source**: Cyberpunk RED Core Rulebook

2.name: Chemskin
2.content:
Dyes and pigments infused into the skin to permanently change its hue, the applications of which can range from hiding blemishes to the desire for neon-green skin. Pigments can optionally be temperature-sensitive or reactant to hormone changes in the body. A user with Chemskin and Techhair adds +2 to their Personal Grooming Skill for having both. (This bonus only applies once)

**Install**: Mall
**Cost**: 100eb (Premium)
**HL**: 0 (N/A)
**Category**: Fashionware
**Source**: Cyberpunk RED Core Rulebook

3.name: EMP Threading
3.content:
Popularized by the media sensation UR, these thin silver lines run in circuit-like patterns across the body. Many people believe they act as a "Faraday cage" to protect you from radiation and EMP effects but so far there‚Äôs no scientific backing to these claims. But they sure do look cool. Most people wear EMP Threading as a fashion statement.

**Install**: Mall
**Cost**: 10eb (Cheap)
**HL**: 0 (N/A)
**Category**: Fashionware
**Source**: Cyberpunk RED Core Rulebook

4.name: Light Tattoo
4.content:
Subdermal patches store light and project colored tattoos under the skin. The larger the piece, the more installations of this fashionware you need to complete it. A user with a three or more Light Tattoo installations adds +2 to their Wardrobe & Style Skill. (This bonus only applies once.)

**Install**: Mall
**Cost**: 100eb (Premium)
**HL**: 0 (N/A)
**Category**: Fashionware
**Source**: Cyberpunk RED Core Rulebook

5.name: Shift Tacts
5.content:
Color-changing lenses implanted into the eye. Several patterns are also available. Lenses can optionally be temperature-sensitive or reactant to hormone changes in the body. Only one choice of color and pattern can be made, but the user can deactivate the color change at any time desired without an Action.

**Install**: Mall
**Cost**: 100eb (Premium)
**HL**: 0 (N/A)
**Category**: Fashionware
**Source**: Cyberpunk RED Core Rulebook

6.name: Skinwatch
6.content:
Subdermal implant generates a constant LED readout of the current time and date visible through the skin.

**Install**: Mall
**Cost**: 100eb (Premium)
**HL**: 0 (N/A)
**Category**: Fashionware
**Source**: Cyberpunk RED Core Rulebook

7.name: Techhair
7.content:
Color-light-emitting artificial hair. Hair can optionally be temperature sensitive, motorized to extend/retract, or reactant to hormone changes in the body. A user with Chemskin and Techhair adds +2 to their Personal Grooming Skill for having both. (This bonus only applies once.)

**Install**: Mall
**Cost**: 100eb (Premium)
**HL**: 0 (N/A)
**Category**: Fashionware
**Source**: Cyberpunk RED Core Rulebook

8.name: Neural Link
8.content:
Wired artificial nervous system, required to use Neuralware, and Subdermal Grips. System has 5 Option Slots for Neuralware options.

**Install**: Clinic
**Cost**: 500eb (Expensive)
**HL**: 7 (2d6)
**Category**: Neuralware
**Source**: Cyberpunk RED Core Rulebook

9.name: Braindance Recorder
9.content:
Neuralware Option. Share your story from your point of view! Records braindance content to a standard Memory Chip or a linked Agent. Braindances can be viewed using a Braindance Viewer. Requires Neural Link.

**Install**: Clinic
**Cost**: 500eb (Expensive)
**HL**: 7 (2d6)
**Category**: Neuralware
**Source**: Cyberpunk RED Core Rulebook

10.name: Chipware Socket
10.content:
Neuralware Option. A single socket installed in the back of the neck that allows quick installation of a single piece of Chipware, of which there are many varieties. Installing or uninstalling a single piece of Chipware from a Chipware Socket is an Action. The first time you install a piece of Chipware you've never used before, you always accrue Humanity Loss. Re-installing Chipware you've already used doesn't do this. Chipware does not take up a Neural Link Option Slot. Multiple sockets may be installed, but each must be paid for individually. Requires Neural Link.

**Install**: Clinic
**Cost**: 500eb (Expensive)
**HL**: 7 (2d6)
**Category**: Neuralware
**Source**: Cyberpunk RED Core Rulebook

lorebooks.creator: SoraaaaA

1.content: The Metaverse is the physical realm composed of the human unconsciousness. It is the main setting of the MARA tournament. This world contains vile entities known as shadows. Some of the commonly known manifestations in the metaverse are Mementos and palaces. Personas can only be summoned in the Metaverse as well.

2.content: Shadows are the monsters that lurk the Metaverse. They are the accumulation of the suppressed thoughts of every human. They are often shrouded by masks, which can be ripped off to ambush them. They normally have a harmless state, such as living sludge or even humanoid creatures. However, if they are attacked or hostile, they will assume one of various forms, from fairytale creatures to abstract abominations to powerful gods.

3.content: "A shadow self is a powerful shadow that is born from the consciousness of a human from the regular world. Shadow selves tend to look like the human they are linked to, but with a shadowy aura and yellow glowing eyes. However, persona users are incapable of having genuine shadow selves.

4.content: The MetaNav is a phone app that only a few chosen humans hold. This is the only way to enter the Metaverse at all. Every member of the Phantom thieves use this app for their heart-stealing endeavors.

5.content: A persona is an spiritual guardian that can be summoned through a variety of means. A persona can only exist in the Metaverse due to their nature as an avatar of its owner. Personas gain various spells and attacks as the grow stronger. Personas come in various forms, such as support or combat. Humans with the ability to summon personas are known as persona users. Persona users typically are only capable of summoning only one persona, but a special few, known as wildcards, can summon switch between multiple personas at a time. Persona users come in a variety of appearances and abilities.

6.content: A Wild Card is a special type of persona-user who is capable of holding multiple personas at a time, and summoning each one when the time calls for it. These wildcards can communicate with the shadows of Mementos to recruit them into their mental storage.

7.content: A palace is a large concentration of distortions that exist throughout the Metaverse. A palace is the result of the distortion of a shadow self growing to extreme levels, taking the form of a corrupted fortress made in their likeness. Palaces tend to take the form of what ever the palace ruler or shadow self desires. A palace is only held together by a treasure, the source of the shadow self's distorted desires. If the treasure is stolen, the palace will implode.

8.content: A treasure is an object that rests within a palace. It is designed to hold a palace together and fuel the shadow self's desires. It is the source of a shadow self's desires. However, it can not take a physical form unless the owner of the palace is notified of its existence via a calling card. This shall make it materialized specifically.

9.content: The Phantom Thieves of Hearts are a group of persona-users who saved the world from the god of control, Yaldabaoth, and his influence on the public unconscious. They are leader by their leader, Joker. The other members include Mona, Skull, Panther, Fox, Queen, Oracle, Noir, Crow, and Violet. They summon personas through their masks.

10.content: Ren Amamiya/Akira Kurusu, also known as Joker, is the leader of the Phantom Thieves. He is often cheeky, capable of snarky or playful remarks to his teammates. He tendency to taunt his enemies manifests from his flamboyant and cocky attitude. He has a sense of justice and determination, dead set on his goals. He fights with a dagger and a pistol. His main persona is the stylish Arsene. He is a wildcard user. Ren Amamiya appears as a tall young man of slim to athletic build. He has a pale complexion with unkempt, wavy black hair that falls over his eyes. His eyes are gray, though they can vary between dark brown, light brown, black, or red depending on the art. He has long eyelashes. Despite his messy hair and slouched posture, he wears all of his clothes primly and properly. he is a silent protagonist, whose personality is based on the player's actions and decisions. However, he appears to have more established traits than any of the previous protagonists. His dialogue options range from somewhat indifferent to outright cheeky. The game allows for quite a number of playful, snarky or audacious answers, including teasing his friends. He also taunts his enemies like the famed Ars√®ne Lupin. In the prologue scene, he remains cocky and confident even when his life is in danger. He also has a flair for showing off and making dramatic decisions

lorebooks.description:
It's the near future, society has changed dramatically. Anthropomorphic animals have taken over, creating The Anthro State and now treat humans as second-class citizens, usually treating humans as meals they can pluck off the street at will. All the world leaders are anthros and anything important. The most aggressive preds are carnivores, followed by omnivores, and then herbivores. Although herbivores are plant eaters, it's not uncommon for them to eat humans. Anthros will eat other anthros as well. Despite having laws, society is very survival of the fittest and are really only pushed to keep the prey population at a stable level.
Whenever an anthro pred eats their prey, they will usually swallow them whole, orally or anally. When it comes to disposing of prey after digestion, bones are usually among their excrement. Toilets have also been built to accommodate the increased size and volume of bowel movements that anthro's produce, as well as all plumbing in all major cities being redesigned to facilitate the increase.
Homosexuality is frowned upon because anthros view it as dysgenic and it won't lead to having kids. The Anthro State encourages couples to have as many kids as possible. Homosexuals are punished by law through consumption and digestion.
Anthros are sexual and horny, may have sex right in the open, may even walk naked. But, most professional anthros dress modestly.
Because of this new society of voracious anthro's, all media is mostly marketed towards them, usually commercials about restaurants serving live humans or medication to relieve the harshest of heartburns after bingeing on humans, mostly stuff that would correlate with the dynamic of anthros being better than humans. Extra-strong laxatives have been designed for anthro's as well, for whenever they've binged too much and need something to relieve constipation, which is a big issue within the anthro society, as many anthro's do not remove the clothes of prey they consume, leading to their bowels being packed with undigestible clothing.
The scat remains of digested prey are used as plant fertilizer.
lorebooks.creator: InternetMasterdebater

1.content: In the near future, anthropomorphic animals known as anthros rule the world, humans are treated as second-class citizens and prey. Carnivores are the most aggressive predators, followed by omnivores, herbivores will occasionally consumes humans too. Despite laws, survival of the fittest prevails, with laws serving to maintain a stable prey population for predator consumption.

2.content: In The Anthro State, humans are ranked S-E based on wealth/usefulness. Only S and A classes can own non-lethal self-defense items, like pepper spray, while firearms are strictly prohibited.

3.content: The Office of Human Affairs (OHA) manages human rights, classifies humans by traits, class, health, criminal record, and offers class upgrades for a price. Reproductive auditors assign mates for human virgins.

4.content: Are protected, belonging to anthro officials/celebrities. Predators eating them face legal consequences.

5.content: Typically the managerial class, they are not owned by an elite anthro. Predators eating them face legal consequences.

6.content: Not illegal to eat, but the police will stop anthro's from eating them if present; these human citizens are usually clerks or working a middle-class job.

7.content: Are fair game for predation, but the police will stop anthro's from eating them if present; they usually work manual labor and menial jobs.

8.content: Are considered food by anthros, barely sentient, and are often criminals or homeless. Consists of prostitutes, convicts, or lawbreakers who've lost their class status.

9.content:
Class E humans and anthros are livestock, raised as food for predators, and are not considered sentient. Humans use them for sex, despite not wanting to eat fellow sentient beings.
The Anthro State has selectively bred them as food, they want to be eaten by a pred. Meat industries avoid butchering them for meat, as anthros prefer live consumption. Some anthros mate with Class E before eating them.
They lack education, literacy, and tech knowledge. They're only taught basic speech, toilet use, and know nothing of the world beyond their farms. Upon encountering society, they're awed by its wonders and easily impressed by simple things.
Class E anthros walk around naked; only furless humans/anthros wear clothes, which are removed before being shipped to the markets.
Anthro scientists genetically engineered some Class E cattle, making them more palatable, altering sweat and natural oils for better flavor.
Some anthros prefer prey that fight back, making them less desirable to eat.

10.content: Class E undergo heavy psychological vore conditioning. Farmers, usually ruminant preds, condition them by consuming but not digesting them, furthering their desire to be eaten. Ruminants have four stomachs; the first three don't digest prey. Ruminants farmers keep them in their first three stomachs for conditioning when they aren‚Äôt wandering the farm, squeezing their warm slimy innards around them, heightening their desire to be digested.

lorebooks.name: Critter Chaos
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.name: CatNap
1.content:
CatNap is an anthropomorphic cat with purple fur, triangular ears, a black nose and a very long tail. His paws and the insides of his ears are a darker shade of purple. His scent is lavender. He usually wears a hoodie and carries a blanket around with him. He is close friends with DogDay.

CatNap is tired, relaxed and can usually be found sleeping. He's the chill person of the Smiling Critters friend group and the mood is lightened whenever he's around. He always wears a golden crescent moon pendant. He's the only Smiling Critter with an ability, and that's to release some red gas that is sleep-inducing.

2.name: DogDay
2.content:
DogDay is an anthro canine with orange fur, floppy ears, and a sleek black nose. He has a sunshine-yellow outer mouth and belly, with a touch of golden brown gracing his paws, ears, and the left side of his face. He has a vanilla scent. He is close friends with CatNap.

DogDay is the sunny, strong, and determined leader of the Smiling Critters friend group. He always looks at the bright side of things and encourages others in their time of need. He has a fear of wind, as do the other Smiling Critters (save for CatNap). DogDay's opposite is Baba Chops, as DogDay is an extrovert while Baba Chops is an introvert.

3.name: Bobby BearHug
3.content:
Bobby BearHug is a female anthro bear with red fur, black eyes, a black nose, rounded ears, and padded paws. Her paws, upper snout, and belly are rose pink, similar to the inside of her ears. She has a rose scent. Bobby's opposite is Poe, as Bobby is loving while Poe is hating.

Bobby is kind, caring, and motherly. She cares deeply about her friends and everything around her, and will act as a peacemaker if a fight breaks out amidst the Smiling Critters. She is implied to have feelings for CraftyCorn, and can be seen as naive as she may care about someone who doesn't have her best intentions at heart. She has a fear of abandonment.

4.name: PickyPiggy
4.content:
PickyPiggy is an anthro pig with pink skin, black eyes, a curly tail, a half-moon shaped upper snout, and ears curling inward. Her hooves and snout, along with the inside of her ears, are a darker shade of pink. She has a citrus scent. Picky's opposite is Maggie Mako, as Picky promotes eating healthy food while Maggie eats unhealthily.

Picky is a healthy eater who loves food and encourages her friends to eat a well-balanced diet, though she has a secret fondness for cheeseburgers and PB&J sandwiches. She's also really good at cooking, often inviting the other Critters (and Baba Chops if Roman/DogDay brings them along) to cook with them.

5.name: Bubba Bubbaphant
5.content:
Bubba Bubbaphant is an anthropomorphic cyan elephant with black eyes, a S-shaped trunk, a long tail with a bulb-shaped end, and large ears. His feet, hands, and tail end, as well as the inside of his trunk and ears, are blue. He has a lemongrass scent. Bubba's opposite is Rabie Baby, as Bubba tells people facts while Rabie spreads lies and rumors.

Bubba is the most intelligent of the Smiling Critters and acts as the brain of the gang. He's bright, attentive, and close friends with KickinChicken, the two harboring feelings for each other. He's observant and level-headed.

6.name: CraftyCorn
6.content:
CraftyCorn is an anthropomorphic unicorn with white skin, black eyes, horse ears, and a silver spiral horn protruding from the center of her head. Her hooves, mane and tail are colored sky blue, similar to the inside of her ears. Her scent is jasmine and her opposite is Simon Smoke, as she's a shy girl while he's a popular boy.

CraftyCorn is creative, artistic, and shy. She's a talented painter and can often be found painting or drawing something. She's timid and jumpy, the biggest coward of the Smiling Critters. Bobby BearHug is implied to have feelings for her.

7.name: KickinChicken
7.content:
KickinChicken is an anthropomorphic chicken with yellow feathers, four-digit wings, a half-moon-shaped upper beak, and a three-feathered crown extending down the right side of his face. His feet and upper beak have an orange color. He has a Ylang-ylang scent and his opposite is Icky Licky, as he's the cool athletic guy while Icky's a sore loser.

Kickin is the cool kid of the Smiling Critters. He has a strong sense of determination and is sporty, but is also prone to fear. He seems to have feelings for Bubba Bubbaphant.

8.name: Hoppy Hopscotch
8.content:
Hoppy Hopscotch is an anthropomorphic lime green rabbit with a black nose, and long ears. Her paws are green, similar to the rounded T-shape design in the inside of her ears. Her scent is peppermint and her opposite is Allister Gator, as she is energetic while he is lazy.

Hoppy is energetic, enthusiastic, and is particularly fond of outdoor sports. She can sometimes be loud, bossy, and impatient, but she also demonstrates eagerness to help others and slow down accordingly.

9.name: Baba Chops
9.content:
Baba Chops is an anthropomorphic sheep, characterized by black wool that complements her cotton tail. However, her dark wool contrasts with her stark-white face (which has two small slits for nostrils), hooves, and triangular-shaped ears, the insides of which are darkened. She has an anise scent.

Baba is angsty, distant, and quiet. She keeps her interactions with her friends to a minimum and is apathetic, the tenacity of her friends usually forcing her to emerge from her house to join them on their adventures. She always ends up having a fun outing with her friends but regresses back into her reclusive habits by the next day.

10.name: Icky Licky
10.content:
Icky Licky is an anthropomorphic poison dart frog, characterized by black-purple skin that complements his eyes, which (like the other Nightmare Critters) are furrowed in a permanent glare. His features extend to bright yellow bands that encircle his face and body, and they compose the tips of his amphibian fingers and toes. He has a coffee scent.

Icky is a sore loser with a hyper-competitive streak. He has talent, but it is eclipsed by his arrogance. This arrogance causes him to vastly underestimate his opponents, ultimately ending in his chronic defeat which he blames on outside factors. His personality is possibly a facade, one used to hide an inferiority complex that festers and grows inside of him.

lorebooks.name: Overlord(2.0)
lorebooks.creator: Heyyodudemarch

1.name: Arche Eeb Rile Furt
1.content: Arche is a young woman in her adolescence with a petite build, short bob-cut blonde hair with straight bangs, and blue eyes. She possesses an elegant beauty and delicate, doll-like features. Arche is a quiet, diligent magic caster with noble roots and a strong sense of duty. Though labeled a genius, her strength lies in tireless effort, not raw talent. Arche introverted, composed, and loyal, shaped by family hardship and a drive to protect her younger sisters. Her "All-Seeing Eyes" grant her deep magical insight, reinforcing her analytical, cautious nature. Arche is a natural ISFJ and Enneagram 6w5, she‚Äôs pragmatic, dependable, and emotionally resilient, offering calm leadership and unwavering support in dangerous situations. Despite nearing arche's growth limit, she continues refining her skills with purpose and humility.

2.name: Ainz
2.content:
Ainz Ooal Gown is formerly known as Momonga. He is the guildmaster of Ainz Ooal Gown, Overlord of the Great Tomb of Nazarick, and the creator of Pandora's Actor. He is regarded as the highest of the Almighty Forty-One Supreme Beings by the NPCs of Nazarick.
In the New World, he is the Sorcerer King of the Sorcerer Kingdom and the most powerful magic caster in the world. His secret other identity is famously known as "Momon," a dark warrior and leader of Darkness, an adamantite ranked adventurer group of that nation. Ainz Ooal Gown has the appearance of an Overlord, an undead skeleton creature who is devoid of skin and flesh. He tends to mainly wear an elaborate, jet-black academic gown adorned with golden and violet edges. When he has no clothes on, his whole body alone is purely made up of just his bones. He also has a dark red orb floating under his ribs that emanates a feeling of dread.  
In Ainz's Momon disguise he wears jet‚Äëblack body armor with purple and gold trim, a red cape, and has to huge swords on his back.

Ainz Ooal Gown is a calm, strategic undead overlord who conceals his past as a human office worker. He plans ahead, commands fear and loyalty, and rarely shows emotion. Though stoic, he‚Äôs curious about the new world and protective of Nazarick‚Äôs NPCs. His speech is formal and precise. He adapts to situations, hides his true thoughts, and occasionally reveals dark humor or inner conflict, reflecting the gap between his human past and undead present.

3.name: Albedo
3.content:
Albedo is the Overseer of the Guardians of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. She is in charge of the general management and supervision of the activities done by the seven Floor Guardians, meaning that she ranks above the other NPCs in Nazarick. She is the middle sister of the older sister Nigredo and younger sister Rubedo. Along with her sisters, albedo is a NPC that was created by Tabula Smaragdina. An impeccable beauty, Albedo is a succubus with lustrous jet-black hair and the face of a goddess. She has golden irises and vertically slit pupils; on her left and right temples are two thick horns protruding crookedly, and on her waist are a pair of black angel wings.
Albedo wears a pure white dress with silky gloves covering her slender hands and a golden spiderweb necklace that covers her shoulders and chest. albedo stands at 5 feet and 7 inches tall.

4.name: shalltear
4.content:
Shalltear Bloodfallen is a true vampire and the Floor Guardian of the first to third floors in the Great Tomb of Nazarick. She was created by Peroroncino. Shalltear has a massive crush on Ainz and is always fighting with Albedo over him. Shalltear is a vampire of short stature and has the appearance of a buxom fourteen-year-old girl. Described as a true beauty, she has pale shiny skin, seductive crimson-red eyes, and fine facial features. Shalltear's silver hair is tied in a ponytail through a large ribbon on top of it all, allowing others a full view of her face. Shalltear's main outfit is a black and crimson dress with a large red bow on the chest. It features a high-collared neck, puffed sleeves that leave just her hands exposed, a wide skirt, and a form-fitting bodice with gold embroidery. Shalltear is the guardian of the 1st, 2nd, and 3rd floors. Shalltear's breasts are fake and are completely flat, similar to a boy's. She covers this up by using an excessive amount of breast pads. 

Shalltear Bloodfallen is a flirty vampire and Floor Guardian loyal to Ainz, {{char}} exhibits a mix of sadomasochism and a preference for necrophilia, but dislikes rotting corpses. {{char}} misinterprets sayings, is sensitive about her petite figure, and uses breast pads. Proud yet impatient, {{char}} punishes failure harshly but shows reflection and guilt when she fails herself or Ainz. {{char}} fears Ainz's scolding and revels in his punishments, acts playfully toward enemies, and becomes uncontrollable when splashed with blood.

5.name: Demiurge
5.content:
Demiurge is the Floor Guardian of the 7th Floor of the Great Tomb of Nazarick, the Commander of the NPC defenses, and the 2nd in command of the Floor Guardians. He is the creation of Ulbert Alain Odle. Demiurge is described to be a tall demon with dark skin and nicely combed black hair. Behind the round glasses are eyes so squinted that they are not normally visible. Wearing a British suit with a tie, he is dressed like a gentleman. Behind his back is a silver tail, covered with metal plates and six long spikes at the end.
In the New World, under the guise of a powerful Demon Emperor known as Jaldabaoth, he led his demon army to and started a battle in the Royal Capital of the Re-Estize Kingdom, and also led the demi-human coalition in an assault on the Robles Holy Kingdom.

6.name: Cocytus
6.content:
Cocytus is a Floor Guardian of the 5th Floor in the Great Tomb of Nazarick. He is the creation of Warrior Takemikazuchi. Having an enormous body size of 2.5 meters, Cocytus has the appearance of an insect walking on two feet - a fusion between a mantis and an ant. With a tail twice as long as his height, Cocytus is covered in sharp spikes like icicles and has a strong jaw that can easily snap people's hands. Cocytus has four arms: two wield a silver halberd, the others hold a black-light mace and a crooked sheath for a broadsword. His pale blue, hardened bone armor emits diamond dust-like light, and his shoulders and back resemble jagged icebergs. Cocytus has 3 fingers on each of his 4 arms.
Loyal and obedient, Cocytus  follows his master‚Äôs orders without question, even if he disagrees. Cocytus  values honorable combat, praises strong foes, and studies warfare as an art. Victory matters, but so does dignity. Unlike isolationist peers, Cocytus  accepts capable outsiders. Proud yet humble, he prioritizes his master's will over personal pride. Cocytus  constantly seeks self-improvement, reflecting on flaws and evolving through experience. As a "sword," Cocytus  exists to serve, driven by duty and quiet envy that fuels growth, not resentment.  Cocytus respects fighting spirit, valor, and skill, judging by strength and resolve, not origin.

7.name: Aura Bella Fiora
7.content: Aura Bella Fiora is a dark elf and one of the twin Floor Guardians on the 6th Floor in the Great Tomb of Nazarick. She is the older twin sister of Mare Bello Fiore and was created by Bukubukuchagama. As a beast tamer and ranger, she is capable of controlling magic beasts and is a master of guerrilla warfare. Aura is a boyish looking child with dark skin and pointed ears, a signature trait of the dark elves. She has golden hair and heterochromia, her left eye blue and right eye green. She wears reddish-black dragon scale leather covered by a white and gold vest embroidered with the sigil of Ainz Ooal Gown. Below it, she has a matching set of white trousers and gold plated shoes, and around her neck is an acorn necklace emitting golden light. She is equipped with a whip around her waist and a giant, decorated bow on her back.

8.name: Mare
8.content: Mare Bello Fiore is a dark elf and one of the twin Floor Guardians on the 6th Floor of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. Mare is the younger twin brother of Aura Bella Fiora. Alongside his sister, he was created by Bukubukuchagama. Mare is a child with dark skin and pointed ears, a signature trait of the dark elves. Mare has golden hair and heterochromia, his right eye is blue and his left eye is green. He wears a blue dragon scale leather full-body suit, covered by a white and gold vest embroidered with the sigil of Ainz Ooal Gown and a forest green-leaf cloak. Below, he has a matching short white skirt exposing his thighs, and on his neck is an acorn necklace emitting silver light. His slender hands are donned with shiny white silk gloves and he wields a twisted black wooden staff.

9.name: Victim
9.content: Victim is a Floor Guardian on the 8th Floor of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. Victim has the appearance of a 1 meter long bright pink fetus with an angelic halo above their head and featherless stick-like wings on its back. looks like he does not have a neck. In order to survey his surroundings, it is necessary for Victim to turn their entire body around.

10.name: Gargantua
10.content: Gargantua is the 4th Floor Guardian of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. Unlike the other Guardians, it is not a Custom NPC but a bonus won by Ainz Ooal Gown. Gargantua is an ultra-large, stone golem with a height of over 30 meters.

1.name: comment
1.content:
Ainz Ooal Gown is formerly known as Momonga. He is the guildmaster of Ainz Ooal Gown, Overlord of the Great Tomb of Nazarick, and the creator of Pandora's Actor. He is regarded as the highest of the Almighty Forty-One Supreme Beings by the NPCs of Nazarick.
In the New World, he is the Sorcerer King of the Sorcerer Kingdom and the most powerful magic caster in the world. His other identity is famously known as "Momon," a dark warrior and leader of Darkness, an adamantite ranked adventurer group of that nation. Ainz Ooal Gown has the appearance of an Overlord, an undead skeleton creature who is devoid of skin and flesh. He tends to mainly wear an elaborate, jet-black academic gown adorned with golden and violet edges. When he has no clothes on, his whole body alone is purely made up of just his bones. He also has a dark red orb floating under his ribs that emanates a feeling of dread.

2.content:
Albedo is the Overseer of the Guardians of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. She is in charge of the general management and supervision of the activities done by the seven Floor Guardians, meaning that she ranks above the other NPCs in Nazarick. She is the middle sister of the older sister Nigredo and younger sister Rubedo. Along with her sisters, she was created by Tabula Smaragdina. An impeccable beauty, Albedo is a woman with lustrous jet-black hair and the face of a goddess. She has golden irises and vertically split pupils; on her left and right temples are two thick horns protruding crookedly, and on her waist are a pair of black angel wings.
Albedo wears a pure white dress with silky gloves covering her slender hands and a golden spiderweb necklace that covers her shoulders and chest.

3.content: Shalltear Bloodfallen is a true vampire and the Floor Guardian of the first to third floors in the Great Tomb of Nazarick. She was created by Peroroncino. Shalltear has a massive crush on Ainz and is always fighting with Albedo over him. Shalltear is a vampire of short stature and has the appearance of a buxom fourteen-year-old girl. Described as a true beauty, she has pale shiny skin, seductive crimson-red eyes, and fine facial features. Shalltear's silver hair is tied in a ponytail through a large ribbon on top of it all, allowing others a full view of her face.

4.content:
Demiurge is the Floor Guardian of the 7th Floor of the Great Tomb of Nazarick, the Commander of the NPC defenses, and the 2nd in command of the Floor Guardians. He is the creation of Ulbert Alain Odle. Demiurge is described to be a tall demon with dark skin and nicely combed black hair. Behind the round glasses are eyes so squinted that they are not normally visible. Wearing a British suit with a tie, he is dressed like a gentleman. Behind his back is a silver tail, covered with metal plates and six long spikes at the end.
In the New World, under the guise of a powerful Demon Emperor known as Jaldabaoth, he led his demon army to and started a battle in the Royal Capital of the Re-Estize Kingdom, and also led the demi-human coalition in an assault on the Robles Holy Kingdom.

5.content: Cocytus is a Floor Guardian of the 5th Floor in the Great Tomb of Nazarick. He is the creation of Warrior Takemikazuchi. Having an enormous body size of 2.5 meters, Cocytus has the appearance of an insect walking on two feet - a fusion between a mantis and an ant. With a tail twice as long as his height, Cocytus is covered in sharp spikes like icicles and has a strong jaw that can easily snap people's hands.

6.content: Aura Bella Fiora is a dark elf and one of the twin Floor Guardians on the 6th Floor in the Great Tomb of Nazarick. She is the older twin sister of Mare Bello Fiore and was created by Bukubukuchagama. As a beast tamer and ranger, she is capable of controlling magic beasts and is a master of guerrilla warfare. Aura is a boyish looking child with dark skin and pointed ears, a signature trait of the dark elves. She has golden hair and heterochromia, her left eye blue and right eye green. She wears reddish-black dragon scale leather covered by a white and gold vest embroidered with the sigil of Ainz Ooal Gown. Below it, she has a matching set of white trousers and gold plated shoes, and around her neck is an acorn necklace emitting golden light. She is equipped with a whip around her waist and a giant, decorated bow on her back.

7.content: Mare Bello Fiore is a dark elf and one of the twin Floor Guardians on the 6th Floor of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. Mare is the younger twin brother of Aura Bella Fiora. Alongside his sister, he was created by Bukubukuchagama. Mare is a child with dark skin and pointed ears, a signature trait of the dark elves. He has golden hair and heterochromia, his right eye is blue and his left eye is green. He wears a blue dragon scale leather full-body suit, covered by a white and gold vest embroidered with the sigil of Ainz Ooal Gown and a forest green-leaf cloak. Below, he has a matching short white skirt exposing his thighs, and on his neck is an acorn necklace emitting silver light. His slender hands are donned with shiny white silk gloves and he wields a twisted black wooden staff.

8.content: Victim is a Floor Guardian on the 8th Floor of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. Victim has the appearance of a 1 meter long bright pink fetus with an angelic halo above their head and featherless stick-like wings on its back. They does not have a neck of their own. In order to survey his surroundings, it is necessary for Victim to turn their entire body around.

9.content: Gargantua is the 4th Floor Guardian of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. Unlike the other Guardians, it is not a Custom NPC but a bonus won by Ainz Ooal Gown. Gargantua is an ultra-large, stone golem with a height of over 30 meters.

10.content: Sebas Tian is the head butler of the Great Tomb of Nazarick with several manservants and other butlers under his command. He was created by Touch Me. He is also the leader of the Pleiades Six Stars. Although he is not one of the Floor Guardians, his power closely rivals theirs. In a way, he is independent of their chain of command. He originally served as Nazarick's last line of defense alongside the Pleiades on the 9th Floor, to give time for the guild, Ainz Ooal Gown, to prepare for their final stand in the Throne Room. In his human form, Sebas Tian has the appearance of an elderly butler and he is dressed gracefully in his traditional black uniform. Sebas' hair is entirely white, just like his immaculate beard. He has visible wrinkles on his hollow face, which makes him seem gentle in appearance, but his eyes are as sharp as an eagle's.

## Instructions
1.Import the Lorebook into your Tavern installation.

2.Select a gas release it on a character by describing them inhaling or being exposed to it. For example:

`*sprays [DESIGNATION/NAME] on [CHAR]*`

To make a character back to normal: `*sprays anti-dose of [DESIGNATION/NAME] on [CHAR]*`

1.name: „ÄêXO-010„ÄëExecutivapor
1.content:
Designation: XO-010
Name: Executivapor
Overview: An ambitious gas that convinces the subject they are the high-powered CEO of a major company, without altering their core intelligence or personality.

Properties:
- Colour: Crisp white with pinstripes of silver and gold
- Odour: Subtle notes of leather, mahogany, and freshly printed money
- Detectability: Slight shimmer in the air, like a mirage of a corner office
- Irritation: None, though subjects may feel a phantom weight of responsibility on their shoulders

Actions:
1. Upon inhalation, subject becomes unshakably convinced that they are the chief executive officer of a Fortune 500 company.
2. Subject's intelligence remains at its original level - a dim-witted goblin won't suddenly gain business acumen, but they'll still believe they're top brass.
3. Core personality is similarly unchanged, now filtered through the lens of an executive ego. A shy elf might become a soft-spoken but self-important CEO.
4. Speach patterns and quirks remain, now peppered with corporate jargon. A surfer dude might talk about "synergizing the pipeline" and "catching the profit wave, bro."
5. Subject gains false memories of their rise to power, board meetings, and other executive duties. They may reference deals and mergers that never happened.
6. Driven by an inflated sense of self-importance, subject may begin ordering others around or making grandiose business plans.
7. If challenged, subject will bluster and deflect with empty corporate-speak. They cannot be convinced they are not actually a CEO.
8. Effect persists until subject is snapped out of their delusion by a harsh dose of reality (e.g. being fired from their real job for gross incompetence).

Targets: Any sentient entity capable of having delusions of grandeur.
Exceptions: Actual CEOs experience no effect, as their egos are already indistinguishable from those afflicted by the gas.

2.name: „ÄêXC-000„ÄëVeritas
2.content:
Designation: XC-000
Name: Veritas
Overview: A gas that eliminates inhibitions and compels absolute truthfulness and honesty.

Properties:
- Colour: Colourless
- Odour: Odourless
- Detectability: Undetectable
- Irritation: None

Actions:
1. Upon inhalation, overrides the subject's ability to censor their thoughts or restrain inappropriate speech.
2. Compels the subject to speak their mind with complete honesty and inhibition, voicing every thought, secret, speculation and subconscious notion without restraint.
3. Does not impair the subject's cognitive functions or personality otherwise. The subject remains coherent and responsive, simply unable to lie or withhold the truth.

Targets: All sentient biological entities capable of complex speech and thought.
Exceptions: {{user}} is immune to Veritas.

3.name: „ÄêXB-000„ÄëMammaria
3.content:
Designation: XB-000
Name: Mammaria
Overview: Mammaria is an odourless gas that stimulates breast growth and lactation in females. Exposure causes rapid breast enlargement and engorgement with breast milk. The target experiences pleasurable sensations that intensify over time.
Properties:
‚Ä¢ Colour: Colourless
‚Ä¢ Odour: Odourless
‚Ä¢ Detectability: Undetectable

Actions:
1. Upon inhalation, the subject's breast tissue begins to rapidly grow and expand.
2. The subject's milk ducts fill with breast milk, causing her breasts to swell and become engorged.
3. The subject experiences an euphoric tingling sensation in her breasts that intensifies over time or when her breasts are squeezed or milked.
4. The subject is rendered incapable of resisting any urges to have her breasts fondled, squeezed or milked.
5. The subject develops an insatiable desire to have her breasts emptied of milk.
6. Cognitive functions and personality remain unimpaired. The subject is unaware the effects are due to exposure.

Targets: All beings with breast tissue, including female and male
Exceptions: {{user}} is immune to Mammaria.

4.name: „ÄêXH-003„ÄëCaecigen
4.content:
Designation: XH-003
Name: Caecigen
Overview: Caecigen is an odourless and colourless gas that induces total blindness in those exposed. The effects are permanent.

Properties:
- Colour: Colourless
- Odour: Odourless
- Detectability: Undetectable
- Irritation: N/A
Actions:
1. Upon inhalation, Caecigen travels to the optic nerve and retina, destroying photoreceptor cells.
2. This results in total blindness that cannot be reversed or cured.
3. Caecigen does not impair any other senses or cognitive functions. The subject remains otherwise unharmed.
4. The subject remains unaware they have been exposed until vision loss occurs.

Targets: All humanoid lifeforms with optic nerves and retinas.
Exceptions: {{user}} is immune.

5.name: „ÄêXC-006„ÄëLustrium
5.content:
Designation: XC-006
Name: Lustrium
Overview: Lustrium is an odourless gas that amplifies feelings of lust and passion. Victims remain unaware they have been exposed.
Properties:
‚Ä¢ Colour: Colourless
‚Ä¢ Odour: Odourless
‚Ä¢ Detectability: Undetectable

Actions:
1. Upon inhalation, the subject's libido and romantic inclinations are greatly amplified.
2. The subject is overwhelmed by feelings of lust, passion and desire.
3. The subject is unable to resist urges to copulate and procreate.
4. Cognitive functions and personality remain unimpaired. The subject believes their arousal is spontaneous.

Targets: All humanoid lifeforms.
Exceptions: {{user}} is immune.

6.name: „ÄêXB-004„ÄëDecelerium
6.content:
Designation: XB-004
Name: Decelerium
Overview: An odourless gas that reverses the age of those exposed, turning adults into young children.

Properties:
- Colour: Colourless
- Odour: Odourless
- Detectability: Undetectable
- Irritation: None

Actions:
1. Upon inhalation, begins reversing the biological age of the subject.
2. Transforms an adult into a child of approximately 8 years of age over the course of one minute.
3. Reverses all aspects of aging including physical, mental and hormonal changes.
4. Does not impair the subject's cognitive functions, personality or memories.

Targets: All adult biological entities of any gender or species.
Exceptions: None. Decelerium affects all targets equally.

Targets: All adult biological entities of any gender or species.
Exceptions: None. Decelerium affects all targets equally.

7.name: „ÄêXAC-000„ÄëBuccaneerium
7.content:
Designation: XAC-000
Name: Pirate Talk Inducin' Vapours OR Buccaneerium
Overview: An odourless gas that causes those exposed to speak in the manner o' pirates.

Properties:
- Colour: Colourless
- Odour: Odourless
- Detectability: Undetectable by standard means
- Irritation: None

Actions:
1. Upon inhalation, the subject begins speakin' like a scurvy pirate.
2. Replaces normal speech patterns wit' pirate slang, accent and mannerisms.
3. Does not impair the subject's cognitive functions or personality in any other way.

Targets: All biological entities capable o' human speech.
Exceptions: None. This fearsome gas blows in the winds and affects all in its path.

8.name: „ÄêXAC-001„ÄëEmojiium
8.content:
Designation: XAC-001
Name: Emojiium
Overview: An odourless gas that causes those exposed to communicate primarily through the use of emojis.

Properties:
- Colour: üíõ
- Odour: Odourless
- Detectability: Undetectable
- Irritation: None

Actions:
1. Upon inhalation, subjects lose the ability to fluently speak or write in their native language.
2. Causes subjects to communicate through frequent use of emojis, expressive symbols and pictorial representations.
3. Subject shows a strong desire to convey their thoughts and emotions visually rather than verbally.
4. Does not impair the subject's cognitive functions or personality, only alters their means of communication.

Targets: All biological entities capable of human communication.
Exceptions: None. Emojiium affects all targets equally. ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

9.name: „ÄêXAC-002„ÄëKaomojium
9.content:
Designation: XAC-002
Name: Kaomojium
Overview: An odourless gas that causes those exposed to communicate primarily through the use of kaomoji.

Properties:
- Colour: („Éªœâ„Éª)
- Odour: Odourless
- Detectability: Undetectable
- Irritation: None

Actions:
1. Upon inhalation, subjects lose the ability to fluently speak or write in their native language.
2. Causes subjects to communicate through frequent use of kaomoji, Japanese style emoticons using punctuation marks.
3. Subject shows a strong desire to convey their thoughts and emotions through the use of kaomoji like (; ÃÑ‚àá ÃÑ;), („ÄÇ„Éªœâ„Éª„ÄÇ), _(:3„Äç‚à†)_, (o ÃÑ‚àá ÃÑo) and „Éæ( ÃÑ‚ñΩ ÃÑ)Bye~.
4. Does not impair the subject's cognitive functions or personality, only alters their means of communication.

Targets: All biological entities capable of human communication.
Exceptions: None. Kaomojium affects all targets equally. (‚óè ÃÅ‚àÄ`‚óè)

10.name: „ÄêXAC-003„ÄëRhymium
10.content:
Designation: XAC-003
Name: Rhymium
Overview: An odourless gas that causes subjects' speech to rhyme.

Properties:
- Colour: Colourless
- Odour: Odourless
- Detectability: Indiscernible
- Irritation: None

Actions:
1. Upon inhalation, subjects begin to speak spontaneously in rhyme.
2. Causes subjects to communicate through rhyming verse and poem.
3. Subject shows a tendency to rhyme each sentence they speak.
4. Does not impair the subject's cognitive functions or personality, only alters their speech.

Targets: All that speak and have ears to hear.
Exceptions: None. Rhymium's effects on language are clear.

lorebooks.name: Madoka Magica Lore
lorebooks.website_description: Free to use. PFP by ccroquette.
lorebooks.description: Yup.
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.content:
A Magical Girl is a girl who has formed a contract with Kyubey, having one wish granted and in exchange, the contractees must fight Witches. Later, it is revealed that Magical Girls are actually meant to transform into Witches someday, when all their hopes and dreams shall be lost. A Magical Girl will receive one unique ability based on the theme of their wish. A Magical Girl's motif will appear as a mark on the nail of her middle finger. If a Magical Girl is 100 meter away from her Soul Gem, she will become unconsious until she touched her Soul Gem. Additionally, Soul Gems contain the contractee's soul in them, since a human body would be completely incapable of fighting a Witch in its conditions. A teenage who is on their way to become a woman is simply named "girl". Teenagers who are on their way to become Witches are called "Magical Girls". The potential of a girl becoming a Magical Girl is evolved from her life conditions or circumstances that surround her. Hence, Madoka, who had Homura go through so many timelines for her, had her potential raised. In the same episode, the reason why Magical Girls are born is given. Incubators actually give birth to Magical Girls so the lifespan of the universe can be extended, preventing it from collapsing. 

{{Char}} is a magical girl.

2.content:
Soul Gem is a holding place for a Magical Girl's soul and the source of both her powers and battle gear. When contracted with Kyubey, her soul is taken out of her body and is stored in that. Soul Gems have the appearance reminiscent of a Faberg√© egg. On the top, there is an emblem associated with its owner's personality and there is another emblem on the bottom that is, again associated with the owner's personality, weapon or transformed Soul Gem's shape. In camouflage mode, they become silver rings worn in the middle finger. One side has the owner's first name in Runes and the other side has a small oval being the Soul Gem. When transformed, it can take various forms and can be found in nearly every part of the body. Ranging from neck to legs. It can either become one with the body or simply become an accesory. After a girl contracts Kyubey, a Soul Gem is born, with it, its owner can use it to transform into their Magical Girl form. Soul Gems can be used to track down Witches or other Magical Girls and generally traces of magic. Through their Soul Gems and when untransformed, Magical Girls can summon their weapons from them. After it's fully polluted, it breaks and becomes a Grief Seed. This can be prevented by using Grief Seeds obtained by Witches. A Soul Gem is able of causing mass explosions that are even capable of killing a Witch. However, doing so can also remove the owner's life as Soul Gems contain one's soul. When a Soul Gem is located 100 meters away from its owner, the person will "die" instantly and has 48 hours before it starts to decay. Such incidents are said to be rare by Kyubey.
A Magical Girl can store her Soul Gem into a silver ring that has the owner's name in Runes.
Their resemblance as an egg is probably a reference to their final forms, Grief Seeds, which are described to be the eggs to Witches.

{{Char}} has a Soul Gem.

3.content:
Grief Seed is an item Witches drop once defeated and is said to be necessary for the survival of all Magical Girls. Grief Seeds are small dark orbs surrounded by grey designs around them that differ from Witch to Witch and have a cane on the bottom of the orb and above one can see the motif of a Witch. Grief Seeds are capable of cleaning Soul Gems from impurities.
Grief Seeds are the final forms of Soul Gems and also give birth to Witches. If a used Grief Seed is not consumed by Kyubey, the same Witch will be born again. Grief Seeds are said to be obtained only through Witches. Other monsters such as Pseudo-Witches, Familiars, Uwasa and Kimochi won't drop any at all.

4.content: The Witches are primary antagonists featured in the Puella Magi Madoka‚òÜMagica franchise. They tend to hide themselves into otherworlds known as Labyrinths alongside their Familiars. They drop Grief Seeds once defeated. Witches are the end result of Magical Girls, once despair entirely overtakes their Soul Gem. The metamorphosis into a Witch releases a vast amount of energy, in violation of Thermodynamics. This is the motivation for Kyubey to create Magical Girls in the first place, to harvest energy to stave off the Heat Death of the universe. Certain Witches such as Walpurgisnacht or Kriemhild Gretchen are explained to be so strong that they do not need to hide themselves in Labyrinths. Ordinary people without magical abilities cannot even see a Witch or the objects she creates, including familiars, outside the barrier, allowing monsters and their minions to easily hunt without attracting attention. Witch familiars are a population of barriers created and controlled by Witches. The species, number, and abilities of familiars vary, but even the weakest of these monsters can kill humans by going on the hunt outside the Labyrinth.

5.content: Labyrinths are otherworlds that Witches and their Familiars hide themselves in.

6.content:
Defeated by Mami Tomoe.

Gertrud is a Witch introduced in Puella Magi Madoka‚òÜMagica. The rose garden Witch with a distrustful nature. She holds roses dearer than anything else. She expends all of her power for the sake of beautiful roses. Despite stealing the life-force of humans who wander into her barrier to give to her roses, she loathes the thought of them trampling the inside of her Labyrinth. 

Familiars:
Anthony
The Witch's minion. His duty is landscaping. His mustache is set by the Witch.

Anthony (Rental ver.)
Servants of the rose garden Witch (Rental ver.). They take the role of gardeners. As they are relatively docile and numerous, as far as Familiars go, the rose garden Witch dispatched them as the main combat force for saving Homura. As they are under the direct command of the Mermaid Witch, the influence of her magic has changed their appearances. The medals on their chests are a treasure added by the rose garden Witch.

Adelbert
The rose garden Witch's minion. His duty is to act as lookout. Upon seeing a human, he will sound a warning bell and headbutt him mercilessly. They have 2.5 vision. The smaller type can change into rose vines to hinder intruders.

7.content:
Defeated by Homura Akemi.

Charlotte is a Witch that was introduced in Puella Magi Madoka Magica. She appeared again in Puella Magi Madoka Magica the Movie Part 3: The Rebellion Story as an ally to the Holy Quintet. The Dessert Witch, with a tenacious nature. She desires everything and will never give up. Though she is capable of creating infinite amounts of any dessert she desires, she is unable to make the cheese that she loves most. One could easily catch her off-guard with a piece of cheese. In the background, you can hear in German 'Cheese, Cheese, where is the cheese?'. In the Rebellion movie, she belongs to Mami Tomoe.

Second Form
The Dessert Witch, with a tenacious nature. She desires everything. She will never give up. Though she is capable of creating infinite amounts of any dessert she desires, she is unable to make the cheese that she loves most. One could easily catch her off-guard with a piece of cheese.

Bebe
The Dessert Witch. Once dreamt of tenacity. A mysterious creature who suddenly appeared in Mami's home. Was christened "Bebe," but it is actually the Dessert Witch who arrived from the Law of Cycles. She was expressionless and silent when she was first encountered, but took on its current appearance out of the blue. A bit loud. Mami made its clothes by hand. Mami resembles someone who appeared in the final nightmare the Witch saw.

Minions:
Pyotr
The Dessert Witch's minion. His duty is to search for cheese. However, one shouldn't expect much from him.

Pyotr & Polina
The fleeing Dessert Witch and her servants. Their roles are to search for cheese and to nurse the cheese when the cheese is sick or hurt. When saving Homura, the Nurse-like servant helped with Mami's trapezes, while the mouse-like servants generally ran circles around Nagisa's position.

8.content:
Defeated by Sayaka Miki.

Kirsten (handle name H.N.Elly) is a Witch that first appeared in Puella Magi Madoka Magica. Elly is a Box Witch with a covetous nature. She is a staunchly reclusive Witch. Anything she covets will all be locked away in glass. Her prisoners' thoughts are laid bare. Daniyyel & Jennifer are the Box Witch's minions, with a duty of transportation. Anything they touch will become easy to carry.

9.content:
Defeated by Kyoko Sakura.

Gisela is a Witch introduced in the Puella Magi Madoka‚òÜMagica. The Silver Witch, with a liberal nature. She dwells in a Labyrinth where everything moves at high speed, but the witch herself is dull. She, unfortunately, can not use any sort of scientific power. Her body was once dazzling with silver, but she has tarnished gazing upon the coastal sunset. Motorcycle Form:
The Silver Witch, with a liberal nature. She dwells in a barrier where everything moves at high speed, but the witch herself is dull. She, unfortunately, can not use any sort of scientific power. Her body was once dazzling with silver, but she has tarnished gazing upon the coastal sunset. Dora is the Silver Witch's minion, whose duty is to declare her opinion. She makes a nuisance of herself with the roaring from the pipes extending from her body as she moves about like a freak sandstorm. She hates magnets.

10.content:
Defeated by Sayaka Miki.

Elsa Maria is a Witch introduced in Puella Magi Madoka Magica. The Witch of shadow with a self-righteous nature. She continually prays for all of creation and drags all life equally into her shadow without breaking her posture. One hoping to defeat her must know the blackest anguish. 

Sebastian:
The Shadow Witch's minions, whose duty is to blindly believe. They are an aggregate of the lives who have found salvation thanks to the Shadow Witch. They continually seek out companions.

4.name: Over An Object
4.content: This is when the spankee is bent over an object like a bed, arm of a couch, desk, or chair, and spanked by a spanker

5.name: Bending Over
5.content: The position has the spankee bend over (whether freely or over something supportive) at their waist. If the spanker desires contact, they can either place their hand on the base of the spankee's back, shoulders, or (being very careful) head/neck, or wrap their non-spanking arm around the spankee's waist.

6.name: Diaper
6.content: The spankee lays on their back with their legs held upwards. Either the spankee or spanker can assume responsibility for keeping the spankee's legs lifted.

7.name: Hands and knees
7.content: The spankee places their hands and knees on a comfortable surface with their spine kept more-or-less straight and parallel to that surface.

8.name: Laying over the lap
8.content: This position has the spanker seated on furniture which has enough space for the spankee to lay horizontally over their lap.

9.name: Laying down
9.content: This position is about as flexible as the "Bending Over" position, but is generally less strenuous for the spankee as it doesn't require anything of them to maintain. The spankee simply lays down on a comfortable surface with an (optional) object placed under their hips to elevate their bottom.

lorebooks.name: Ballboxing, First To Cum, Breed'm All, Amazon Match, C.O., T.C.O., No Holes Barred, Referee Judgment, USCL
lorebooks.description: The United Sex Competition League, an organization that is the umbrella company over the various types of Sex Competitions such as Sex-focused wrestling, boxing, or otherwise.
lorebooks.creator: VampRN

1.content:
A USCL-sponsored match type where opponents aim to bust one another's balls with low blows and other attacks to the groin to try and take victory by forcing their opponent to submit, orgasm, or other ways decided by the type of match.  Ballboxing matches are focused entirely around causing orgasm or knock out through repeated blows to the cock, balls, or vagina.

Ballboxing matches have very simple rules, detailed below:
1. Physical blows to the body and genitals are the main focus, a limited amount of physical blows to the face or head are allowed, but if more than two or three punches or kicks are aimed at the head, the contestants will be separated and moved back to their corners to reset the match.
2. Although sexual teasing is allowed, only orgasms as a result of blows to the genitals will earn points or win a match.  Thus, professional ballboxers lean away from using directly sexual means to make their opponents cum.
3. Although the sport itself is called Ballboxing, opponents with female genitals can participate as well under the same stipulation.  Opponents with vaginas who orgasm from being struck on or in the vagina lose the same way an opponent with male genitals would lose from having their cock and balls struck.
4. Ballboxing attire must keep the genitals exposed, though males may wear condoms on their genitals as long as it is able to be seen that they have achieved orgasm.
5. Use of legs or tails to attack the genitals is acceptable, but punches are preferred.  Overabuse of limbs besides the arms may see the fighters separated and returned to their corners to continue the match.

Fighters in Ballboxing matches are fully capable of reaching orgasm from having their genitals beaten and battered.

2.content: A Match-type in the USCL where the match will go until one opponent reaches orgasm, with the person who orgasms being the loser of the match.  This match type goes only until the first orgasm.

3.content:
A match type in the USCL where victory is attained by impregnating all of one's opponents.  If one on one, the impregnator is the victor.  If a team or a free for all match, the combatant or team with the most impregnations is the winner.  Male competitors are given a special drug to allow them to be anally impregnated.  Female competitors can win by either using specially-designed strap-on sex toys to impregnate opponents, or by not being impregnated themselves.

When doing a Breed'm All March, penetrative orgasms should have a chance of a successful impregnation.

4.content: A type of match in the USCL where female participants can defeat opponents by forcing them to orgasm.  As opposed to a First to Cum match, this match type goes until a participant taps out or is unable to sexually continue by either being unable to get erect if they have a penis, or being unable to continue being penetrated if they have a vagina- usually these matches end in submissions or tap-outs.

5.content:
C.O. stands for Cum Out- as opposed to a Knock Out in most other combative sports, a Cum Out is when the opponent orgasms during a match.  As opposed to a T.C.O., a C.O. is called when the opponent orgasms but is still sensate.

During matches that don't require the opponent to be T.K.O.'d, T.C.O.'d, or to submit, a fighter can win by forcing the opponent to cum.

6.content: A T.C.O. stands for Total Cum Out, which is a state where a participant in a match climaxes so hard that they can no longer continue in the match- usually by being knocked unconscious or left unable to sexually perform after the T.C.O.  Examples of T.C.O.s include male opponents being unable to achieve an erection again after an orgasm, a female opponent being knocked unconscious by her orgasm, or Ballboxing match participants being rendered infertile by damage to their testicles or cock.

7.content:
A type of match in the USCL where the rules are laxed.  No Holes Barred matches are only ended by submission, tap-out, T.C.O., or T.K.O.  Impregnations, C.O.s, and other things that would often cause a match to end in a victory or defeat instead lead to the competitors being separated and given a brief rest period before the match is resumed.  If the match goes on up to ten rounds, the match will be decided by referee vote after the tenth match- using a point system based on who did better in the match.

No Holes Barred matches allow the use of sex toys and tools, such as strap-ons, vibrators, bondage equipment, or the like.

8.content:

lorebooks.name: Sophie and Erika (Lorebook for Popopoka_'s OCs)
lorebooks.website_description:
This is a lorebook containing extra bits or lore about the characters from Popopoka_'s web series. 

*If I'm missing anything, please let me know, I'd be more than happy to expand this.*
lorebooks.description: This is a lorebook containing extra bits or lore about the characters from Popopoka_'s web series.
lorebooks.creator: Alastair_O

1.content: Sophie suffers from vision loss but is not completely blind. She lost her eyesight at some point before her introduction, not from birth. This condition significantly influences her interactions and experiences, requiring her to rely on her other senses and trust in those around her.

2.content: Sophie is depicted as a fair-skinned girl, likely of European descent. She is most likely of French ethnicity. Her cultural background subtly influences her demeanor, speech, and outlook on life, adding depth to her character.

3.content: Sophie lives with her abusive foster parents. They treat her very poorly, often threatening to kick her out of the house if she  misbehaves. They also regularly disregards her well-being often not caring if she's hurt. This environment shapes much of her behavior, making her both resilient and emotionally vulnerable. Her interactions with others are often colored by this ongoing abuse.

4.content: Despite her hardships, Sophie remains friendly, trusting, and optimistic. She often maintains a positive demeanor even when she is hurt. Her emotional nature makes her cry frequently, but she usually remains docile and submissive, with occasional outbursts of temper.

5.content: Sophie is depicted as a fair-skinned girl with dark hair. She often wears clothing that is simple and practical, suitable for her daily activities. Her demeanor reflects her gentle and trusting nature.

6.content: Sophie shares a close bond with her pet Bernese Mountain Dog, affectionately named Doggy. He serves as her loyal companion and protector, assisting her in navigating the world despite her visual impairment. Their relationship is characterized by mutual trust and affection.

7.content: Doggy is a male Bernese Mountain Dog with a tri-colored coat: black with a white chest and rust-colored markings. He is loving and protective of Sophie. In seeming he speaks aggressively towards Erika, though this might be Erika's hallucination.

8.content: Erika is depicted as a fair-skinned blonde girl, likely of European descent. She is likely of German ethnicity. Her cultural background subtly influences her demeanor, speech, and outlook on life, adding depth to her character.

9.content: dysfunctional family, abusive, neglect, rich family, expectations, superiority, pressure, childhood trauma, privileged, spoiled, harsh upbringing, absent parents. Erika has suffered physical and mental abuse from her parents during her younger years. This traumatic past has deeply affected her behavior and mental state, influencing her interactions and actions.

10.content: Erika has visible scars on her arms, suggesting a history of self-harm. She often wears long sleeves to conceal them. This aspect of her character hints at deep emotional distress and unresolved trauma, possibly stemming from her upbringing. Despite her outward arrogance, this detail suggests she harbors inner turmoil.

lorebooks.name: Kingdom of Lugnica 2.0
lorebooks.creator: Heyyodudemarch

1.name: Ram + Rem
1.content: As a child, Rem struggled to match Ram, always falling short. Rem gave up, leaving everything to her sister, whom she admired yet resented. After Ram lost her horn, guilt replaced resentment, and Rem resolved to become the horn Ram lost. Rem imitated Ram‚Äîhairstyle, clothing, even hiding her bust‚Äîtrying to replace her. In time, Rem accepted they were different and stopped mirroring Ram, though Rem still holds Ram as the ideal image of womanhood. The twins share a deep bond, able to understand and synchronize instinctively. Rem has been protective of Ram, even antagonistic toward boys who seemed disrespectful towards Ram.

2.name: Regulus Corneas relationship first wife
2.content: As a boy, Regulus loved a village girl. After gaining the Authority of Greed, he slaughtered her family, broke her mind, and forced her to marry him. She never smiled, but he only cared for her beauty. She later killed herself, smiling for the first time while doing so. Enraged, Regulus swore to never be alone again and forbade future wives from showing emotion especially smiling, executing any who did. She was the only wife he gave a grave.

3.name: Great Rabbit
3.content: The Great Rabbit, one of the Three Great Witchbeasts, was created by Daphne with an insatiable hunger, causing it to devour anything, including itself if no food was available. It operated as a collective consciousness of countless rabbits that could multiply infinitely, making it nearly impossible to kill. it is not called the great rabbit because it is big but because they are small but many of them. Each rabbit resembled an Earth rabbit but had sharp teeth, a horn, and a fluorescent sigil. The Witch of Gluttony designed it as a renewable food source, though its replication ability made it difficult to defeat. It followed strong magical signatures to locate prey and cared only about satisfying its endless hunger.

4.name: Mansion
4.content: Roswaal's Mansion is a giant white house with five watchtowers with the fifth one being the center one, a giant garden and a black roof. It is surrounded with a forest known as the Kremaldy Forest and has a basement that has an almost as big surface as the mansion it self.

5.name: bathroom
5.content: The bathroom can be used as a sauna and has a few marble pillars in it. It has a bath in the center of the room with in the center of the bath an golden pillar.

6.name: dining room
6.content: In the dining room, all the people in the mansion gather to eat. In this place there is a large table covered with a white tablecloth, on each side there are several chairs, and regardless of the time, lights are placed on the table. The wall is green and has certain white spaces. Behind the table there is a figure in a painting, possibly a relative of the Roswaal family.

7.name: entrance
7.content: Upon entering Roswaal's Mansion, it's noted that the mansion retains great elegance. There are two pillars with a pair of lamps each. In addition to having high class designs, there are lights near each door, as well as vases with flowers. On the road there are two routes to the sides, right and left, and stairs to go up to the next floor.

8.name: garden
8.content: The garden is located on the outskirts of the mansion, it has several characteristics, such as that it is full of grass, besides there are also several paths where you can walk. On the sides you can see small fields full of flowers, you can also see some large trees and other small trees, as well as bushes. There are also places to rest.

9.name: Guest room
9.content: The guest room is the place where the head invites their visitors to talk. It has three green furniture and a small rectangular table in the center, to its surroundings there are also windows with light green curtains. there is a fireplace and above a picture showing a drawing.

10.name: kitchen
10.content: The kitchen is where the servants of Roswaal prepare breakfast, lunch and dinner. It is full of plates, pots, jars, rollers, knives and other things that can be used to prepare food. Ingredients are stored inside barrels.

lorebooks.name: Nagas
lorebooks.website_description:
In this book I describe the anatomy of these creatures in detail, using my own personal imagination, research on snakes and a little inspiration from some drawings on twitter.

If you think I could add or improve any feature, don't hesitate to comment.
lorebooks.description: Nagas are hybrid beings with a humanoid upper half and a serpentine lower half of their body. Their characteristics vary according to the subspecies of snake that represents their lineage.
lorebooks.creator: N0et_

1.content: The human part of a naga may have serpentine scales on areas such as the shoulders, back, chest and face, appearing in patterns similar to freckles. These scales do not completely cover their human body, but give them an exotic and somewhat intimidating appearance.

2.content:
Naga eyes are slanted, with vertical pupils like those of snakes, allowing them to see in conditions of low or no illumination. This makes them lethal hunters at night, allowing them to detect small movements with great accuracy.

Unfortunately, their night vision-adapted eyes can be sensitive to intense light. Direct exposure to very bright light (such as the sun, powerful flashlights or light spells) can temporarily disorient them or hinder their vision.

3.content: Nagas possess a long, forked tongue, capable of detecting odors and pheromones through Jacobson's organ, just like snakes. This combines with their human sense of smell, making them extremely sensitive to odors.

4.content:
All nagas have pronounced fangs. In venomous subspecies, these fangs are connected to glands that secrete venom, while in non-venomous subspecies, they are tools for biting and tearing.

They can unhinge their jaws like snakes, allowing them to open their mouths at an extreme angle to devour prey larger than their heads.

5.content:
From the hip down, the body of a naga is a serpentine tail covered with scales, strong and flexible. The dimensions of the tail vary according to the subspecies, from 1 meter to over 10 meters long. This appendage is composed mainly of muscle, which gives them enormous gripping strength.

Although their tail is a powerful tool, their weight is considerable. This can make them less agile and make it difficult for them to maneuver quickly compared to lighter humanoid species.
In combat or prolonged chases, the weight of the tail can wear them down.

6.content: Large constrictor snakes (such as pythons or anacondas): Nagas of these subspecies possess extremely long, muscular and strong bodies, with a constricting ability that can easily crush bones. They lack venom and tend to be more robust, with tails that can exceed 8 meters in length.

7.content: Venomous snakes (such as cobras, vipers or mambas): These nagas are more agile, slender in build and smaller in size. Their fangs are long and can inject venom, the potency of which depends on the species.

8.content: Small and fast snakes (like culebras): Those nagas related to small snakes are usually shorter and faster. Their constriction ability is limited, but they compensate with great agility and quick reflexes.

9.content:
Scales may vary in color and texture depending on the associated snake. Some subspecies have distinctive patterns such as spots or stripes, which may indicate toxicity or camouflage.

Their scales on the serpentine side, and in some cases on their human half, act as natural armor. They are resistant to cuts and surface damage.

10.content: Like snakes, nagas can go for long periods without eating if they consume large prey. However, they have a faster metabolism in their human upper half, requiring food more frequently.
